spiritsExplanation:
The workout titled "Plyometric Circuit" involves a high-energy, intense session combining plyometric movements with circuit training. The presence of 'AMRAP' (As Many Rounds As Possible) and two-minute intervals on the Hydrow suggests a fast-paced, demanding routine typical of High-Energy & Intense spirits, earning a score of 0.8. The playlist featuring hip hop and R&B tracks like "Ms. New Booty" and "Always On Time" further underscores this energetic approach.

The Structured & Disciplined spirit is also applicable with a score of 0.6 due to the circuit format and the structured inclusion of intervals, which require methodical pacing and discipline. The categorization as "On The Mat" with equipment like dumbbells indicates a structured workout setting, emphasizing technical precision.

Soothing & Restorative and Flow & Rhythm were excluded as the session lacks a focus on relaxation or continuous fluid motion. Sport & Agility and Outdoor & Adventure are inappropriate given the indoor, non-sport-specific nature of the workout.
